meanings.sent1: The subways in the city are fast and convenient for traveling underground.
meanings.sent2: I take the subways to work every morning to avoid traffic.
meanings.sent3: The mice in the subway were seen riding tiny trains underground.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a complex subway system, with thoughts racing in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The subway hummed with the sound of trains rushing through the tunnels.

meanings.definition: A passageway under a street for pedestrians.
meanings.sent1: The subway provided a safe path for pedestrians to cross the busy street.
meanings.sent2: The subway was well-lit and clean, making it a pleasant walk for pedestrians.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the subway was a secret tunnel leading to a treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a bright light at the end of a dark subway tunnel.
meanings.sent5: The subway echoed with the footsteps of pedestrians passing through.

meanings.sent1: The subway system connected various parts of the city for easy access.
meanings.sent2: The subway system was efficient, with clear signs directing travelers.
meanings.sent3: The subway system resembled a maze, with twists and turns at every corner.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts formed a complex subway system, with ideas branching out in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The subway system buzzed with the energy of people rushing to their destinations.
